entry.title: Very functional
entry.content: I've been using this app for over two years and I find it very easy to use! Sending money transfers, paying bills and so many other things are now fast to do, and I don't ever need to go to the bank! I can even deposit a cheque! Incredible! The customer service of RBC is truly the best! Thank you RBC :)

Very functional

I've been using this app for over two years and I find it very easy to use! Sending money transfers, paying bills and so many other things are now fast to do, and I don't ever need to go to the bank! I can even deposit a cheque! Incredible! The customer service of RBC is truly the best! Thank you RBC :)

entry.title: Not working properly
entry.content: This app has so many issues. Half the time I cannot deposit cheques online and have to go to the bank, which defeats the purpose of the cheque deposit function completely! Have a problem with government issued cheques (cannot read the front of the cheque) and an issue with certain bank drafts (eg BMO) - says it cannot deposit an overseas cheque. Please fix your app!!!

Not working properly

This app has so many issues. Half the time I cannot deposit cheques online and have to go to the bank, which defeats the purpose of the cheque deposit function completely! Have a problem with government issued cheques (cannot read the front of the cheque) and an issue with certain bank drafts (eg BMO) - says it cannot deposit an overseas cheque. Please fix your app!!!

entry.title: Is it ever gonna get fixed?
entry.content: I used to love this app, but for the last half a year it‚Äôs been a miserable experience. I haven‚Äôt been able to send money to my wife or anyone else for that matter (great when you have to pay rent) for over three months, and a couple other features that I don‚Äôt use as much haven‚Äôt been working. I‚Äôve re-downloaded the app, signed in and out, even got a newer phone and the app still doesn‚Äôt work properly. It‚Äôs a real pain to have to run two towns over to go to a branch just to shuffle money around.

Is it ever gonna get fixed?

entry.title: Cheque deposit
entry.content:
This issue happened a couple years ago, they fixed it, and now with the latest update its back. The cheque deposit function tries to take the picture for you but with this update, it either isn‚Äôt working or has such strict requirements for detecting the cheque that it refuses to capture a cheque on a plain dark surface.
Please fix, this is incredibly annoying and the cheque deposit option is once again useless

Cheque deposit

This issue happened a couple years ago, they fixed it, and now with the latest update its back. The cheque deposit function tries to take the picture for you but with this update, it either isn‚Äôt working or has such strict requirements for detecting the cheque that it refuses to capture a cheque on a plain dark surface.

Please fix, this is incredibly annoying and the cheque deposit option is once again useless

entry.title: Very glitchy update
entry.content: The new update has made the app very glitchy and temperamental. I‚Äôve had this app for years and this is the first time it‚Äôs been so problematic - no matter how many times I uninstall/reinstall, turn off my phone, etc., I can‚Äôt even look at account details without being automatically logged off. I end up having to go online, which defeats the purpose of the app. Can you please fix whatever‚Äôs wrong? Thanks in advance.

entry.content: I love the RBC app since it‚Äôs so convinient than logging onto the website, I wish it was easier to pay or balances on my credit card by just clicking the expense and having an option to pay it back right away by choosing the appropriate account. Other than that I love the app.
